Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: cdk

Arguments.Name: init
Arguments.Description: Create a new, empty CDK project from a template

Arguments.Name: metadata
Arguments.Description: Returns all metadata associated with this stack

Arguments.Name: doctor
Arguments.Description: Check your set-up for potential problems

Arguments.Name: diff
Arguments.Description: Compares the specified stack with the deployed stack

Arguments.Name: deploy
Arguments.Description: Deploy the specified stack(s) into your AWS account

Arguments.Name: bootstrap
Arguments.Description: Deploys the CDK toolkit stack into an AWS environment

Arguments.Name: synth
Arguments.Description: Synthesizes and prints the CloudFormation template for this stack

Arguments.Name: ls
Arguments.Description: List all stacks in the app

Arguments.Name: import
Arguments.Description: Import existing resource(s) into the given STACK

Arguments.Name: ack
Arguments.Description: Acknowledge a notice so that it does not show up anymore

Arguments.Name: notices
Arguments.Description: Returns a list of relevant notices

Arguments.Name: doc
Arguments.Description: Opens the reference documentation in a browser
